info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 7:22PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Meade and northern Lawrence Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 721 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Spearfish, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Spearfish, northern Spearfish Canyon and Bridal Veil Falls around 730 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Lead, Deadwood, Whitewood, Central City, Sturgis, Galena, Apple Springs and Fort Meade. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 5 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for northwestern and west central South Dakota.
